abstract: Neighborhood Joint column profiles Permanent Records, record shop in Greenwood, Brooklyn, offering both rare albums and guilty pleasures to collectors.
lead_paragraph: Permanent Records, tucked into an office building on 20th Street and Fourth Avenue in Brooklyn, is eagerly sought out by record lovers seeking a wide variety of genres.

headline.main: At Permanent Records, a Vinyl Assortment of Rare Finds and Guilty Pleasures
headline.print_headline: Rare Finds and Guilty Pleasures on Vinyl

snippet: Permanent Records, tucked into an office building on 20th Street and Fourth Avenue in Brooklyn, is eagerly sought out by record lovers seeking a wide variety of genres.
